articles.author: Esther Webber, Alex Wickham
articles.title: Boris Johnson rushes Downing Street clearout after losing top ally - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Long-serving Johnson ally quits, prompting other exits from PM’s team.
articles.content:
LONDON Boris Johnson’s premiership has looked wobbly for weeks. On Thursday the wheels in the form of a string of top aides really started to come off.
Long-serving Johnson ally Munira Mirza, head o… [+4171 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Vardhan
articles.title: Mars-bound astronauts can avoid aggression, muscle loss with hibernation during trips - Republic World
articles.description: A European Space Agency (ESA) study has suggested that putting astronauts into hibernation could be the best way to ensure their safe trip to Mars
articles.content: An investigation being conducted by the European Space Agency (ESA) has suggested that putting astronauts into hibernation could be the best way to ensure their safe trip to Mars. Considering how lon… [+2395 chars]
